programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E01, After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E19, After U.S. Navy sailor disappears in 68, the Navy claims he went AWOL. But his sister works for over 30 years to prove that he was really killed. And DNA from a cigarette butt helps detectives to unravel a 20-year-old case of rape and murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5011, Nine years after the murders of a mother and her teenage daughters, a wiretapped conversation helps police to crack the case. And the baffling murder of a Virginia woman is solved when human bones are discovered by a geologist in North Carolina.

programme.title: The Widow And The Wolf/Texas Drifter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E04, After the murder of her aunt goes cold, a woman helps launch an advocate group that brings awareness to cases that have gone unsolved.

programme.title: The Cuff Link/The Unluckiest Man
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E11, Police solve an old murder case with a painstaking examination of the tool mark on the plastic flex cuff that bound the victim's hands, and a 15-year-old murder case is finally cracked open.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E10, Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Ashes
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E20, When a deadly house fire claims the life of a family in rural Oklahoma, investigators suspect foul play and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.title: Sweethearts, Silenced
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E04, A killer authors a book about his con-man past that becomes the key to solving a 29-year-old cold case of two high school sweethearts--and three other cold case murders--leading police to believe he could be the Zodiac Killer.

programme.title: Killings on Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E02, A family is torn apart by their grandparents' murders. Two decades later, a cold case detective takes on the case that has haunted him since he was a child--racing to solve it before the family takes matters into their own hands.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E18, After 19 years, Kansas detectives reopen the case of a banker found beaten to death in his bed--and the chief suspect is his cheating wife. And a man with a guilty conscience helps Arkansas police to crack a cold case of murder.

programme.title: A Family Cursed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E09, One family faces two unsolved murders of their loved ones. It takes thirteen years for detectives to uncover the one missing clue that can lead them to the killer: the hidden crime scene.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E23, When a woman is found murdered in her mobile home, police make two shocking discoveries--her husband may not only have been the killer, but he may have also killed his first wife 31 years before.

programme.title: The Boy And The Monster/Secret In The Cellar
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E02, In Portland, Maine a housewife disappears. One year later her body is unearthed in the cellar. I.R. unravels this cold case investigation from the inside out. With the help of science, police are able to uncover a blueprint of the crime.

MST3K: Invasion U.S.A., 19940723000000 +0000, A group of barflies must figure out what to do when the Soviets attack the U.S. in Invasion USA (1952)

MST3K: The Amazing Transparent Man, 19950318000000 +0000, During the feature film The Amazing Transparent Man (1960), a mad scientist makes an escaped criminal invisible so he can steal radioactive supplies.
MST3K: The Crawling Hand, 19891216000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots have a tough time agreeing on how to spend their free time between segments of the teen sci-fi thriller "The Crawling Hand".

MST3K: Women Of The Prehistoric Planet, 19900220000000 +0000, Our intrepid hosts are trapped between Isaac Asimov's Literary Doomsday Device and Robert Ito from Quincy M.E. (1976) in a fur caveman outfit.

programme.title: Danger Death Ray
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Danger Death Ray, S06E20, A slick secret agent investigating an evil organization that stole a top secret death ray.

programme.title: Mitchell
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Mitchell, S05E12, The trio sit through a dreary Joe Don Baker disasterpiece as Gypsy tries to find a way to save Joel from being killed by the Mads.

programme.title: Samson vs. The Vampire Women
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Samson vs. The Vampire Women, S06E25, While Mike and the Bots wrestle with Santo Versus the Vampire Women, TV's Frank is assumed into Second Banana Heaven, leaving no one for Dr. Forrester to kill.

programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E18, Advance your career by finishing this enlightening two-part short featuring timeless sales advice.

programme.title: We're Not Losing a Son
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Abby settles in and starts her job at her firm's Baltimore office.

programme.title: We're Gaining a Daughter
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. As Kevin remains missing, the O'Brien family nervously wait for news.

programme.title: Georgia on My Mind
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E06, Hallmark Original Series. Kevin's fiance, Georgia, arrives in Chesapeake Shores.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E07, Hallmark Original Series. Abby finds out the truth about the fraud investigation from an unlikely source.

programme.title: Deals Undone
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E08, Hallmark Original Series. Mick faces a failing business deal while Abby is subpoenaed.

programme.title: Exes Mark the Spot

programme.title: Secrets, Lies and School Supplies
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Trace and the O'Briens attempt to put their own challenges aside.

programme.title: Pasts and Presents
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. Jess turns to her mother for help planning her cousins wedding.

Journey, 19951210000000 +0000, A grandfather struggles to get through to his grandson after the boy's mother abandons him and his sister. Stars Jason Robards and Meg Tilly. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Pictures of Hollis Woods, 20071202000000 +0000, Having run away from a succession of foster homes, a 12-year-old girl resorts to desperate measures to stay with the eccentric retired teacher who's made her feel like she's finally in the place where she belongs.

The Return of the Native, 19941204000000 +0000, Tumultuous romantic entanglements of Eustacia Vye and the two men in her life are set in England's Egdon Heaths. Stars Clive Owen, Catherine Zeta-Jones, and Ray Stevenson. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
My Sister's Keeper, 20020127000000 +0000, Two sisters embark on a journey of discovery and reconciliation in this poignant real-life story based on the memoirs of Margaret Moorman.

Cupid & Cate, 20000507000000 +0000, Mary-Louise Parker stars as a vibrant young woman who breaks off an uninspired relationship when she falls for a witty and kind young lawyer. Also stars Peter Gallagher and Bebe Neuwirth. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Seizure
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E15, Homeworld Command tries to convince an ally they suspect might be infiltrated by the Lucian Alliance to let them use their planet to power up and dial Destiny. Meanwhile, Rush is trapped in a simulation created by Amanda Perry.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E16, While exploring a planet, the team is attacked and members are taken captive by an alien creature. The team must turn to Varro and his Lucian team for help. Meanwhile, on Destiny, Eli and Brody mistakenly trap Brody in a cryogenic device.

programme.title: Lost City (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E21, O'Neill allows the knowledge of the Ancients to be downloaded into his mind again, even though the first time almost killed him. While he slowly deteriorates, he and SG-1 must race against time to uncover the secret of the Lost City of the Ancients.

programme.title: Lost City (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E22, O'Neill allows the knowledge of the Ancients to be downloaded into his mind again, even though the first time almost killed him. While he slowly deteriorates, he and SG-1 must race against time to uncover the secret of the Lost City of the Ancients.

programme.title: New Order (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E01, When Carter and Teal'c fly to the Asgard world of Hala in hopes of finding a way to revive O'Neill, they are attacked by Replicators, who take Carter prisoner. Meanwhile, Dr. Weir and Jackson attempt to negotiate a treaty with Goa'uld System Lords.

programme.title: New Order (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E02, The Goa'uld send a mothership to Earth, demanding that it prove its superior defenses. As Dr. Weir applies her most expert diplomatic tactics, Jackson and the still-unconscious body of O'Neill are unexpectedly beamed aboard Thor's ship.

programme.title: Lockdown
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E03, When Jackson contracts a mysterious illness, O'Neill is convinced that a contagion has infected the base and orders a lockdown. But when Jackson reveals that he was actually possessed by Anubis, O'Neill must discover the identity of the new host!

programme.title: Zero Hour
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E04, O'Neill deals with a visit from the president and negotiations between two warring tribes from Amra. When SG-1 is captured, he's forced to choose between the safety of the team and the fate of a planet, making him question his competency!

programme.title: Icon
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E05, On a distant planet the Stargate has become a symbol to the people, and some believe that the gods will return through it to reward the faithful. SG-1 realizes that those gods are the Goa'uld and warn of the danger they may face.

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E06, The team agrees that an easy VR simulator is a useless training tool against the Goa'uld. Teal'c lets it learn from him, but as he plays, the game sends a shock each time he dies, and if he doesn't defeat the game, the chair will kill him.

programme.title: Affinity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E07, Teal'c, having finally been cleared to live off-base, settles into his new neighborhood. His neighbors love him. He's quiet and he has become a sort of protector of his community but not everybody is as pleased about Teal'c's civilian assimilation.

programme.title: Covenant
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E08, Alec Colson is claiming he has shocking proof that the government is covering up a liaison with aliens, and that Earth was almost destroyed by an alien invasion, Colson gives all nations involved 24 hours to come clean or he'll do it for them.

programme.title: Sacrifices
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E09, Teal'c and Bra'tac have just returned from the planet Ha'ktyl, where they tried to convince the warrior-woman rebel leader Ishta, to wait until her fellow insurgent Jaffa grow numerous enough to wage war against all the Goa'uld system lords at once.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E10, The Stargate is missing. Upon investigation the team notice a scientist tagging the stargate with a locator beacon. It looks like this is the work of The Trust taking whatever ruthless action they deem necessary to protect Earth from alien invaders.

programme.title: New Order (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E02, The Goa'uld send a mothership to Earth, demanding that it prove its superior defenses. As Dr. Weir applies her most expert diplomatic tactics, Jackson and the still-unconscious body of O'Neill are unexpectedly beamed aboard Thor's ship.

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E09, After working for countless hours on the Replicator coding, Dr. McKay reluctantly admits that he needs help from his sister, Jeanie. But she goes missing, McKay travels to Earth determined to find her and uncover who is behind the kidnapping.

programme.title: This Mortal Coil
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E10, As Dr. McKay struggles to figure out why the stargate has been inoperable, a mysterious probe plunges into the city. A sweep of the probe offers McKay a shocking glimpse of nanite code before his diagnostic program crashes and all the data is lost.

programme.title: Fortune Cookie
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E20, Dylan's friendly gift to Kelly upsets Gina; Steve is unnerved by a psychic's bitter prediction; David and Claudia lay the groundwork for their faux marriage; a high-school nemesis asks for Donna's help; Matt prepares to advertise on TV.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E22, Kelly and Dylan subdue a man who tries to attack a pregnant woman and her child. Gina receives an offer to become a skating commentator. Noah reveals that he has a half-sister, who is working at a nearby diner.

programme.title: End of the World As We Know It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E23, Noah's father's company is sued by Matt; Katie moves forward with David; a nannycam catches Matt and Kelly making love; Steve goes Y2Krazy, ignoring - or avoiding - a trip with Janet; a model makes a play for Donna.

programme.title: Agony
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E25, Kelly receives medical treatment and files a police report. Matt helps a thief gain his release through a technicality. Although Dylan warns that she is still fragile, David asks Gina on a date.

programme.title: The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E01, Kelly is arrested and held overnight until the shooting is ruled a justifiable homicide. David asks Dylan to move out. Wayne annoys Donna with his cavalier attitude, particularly when he fails to show sensitivity toward Kelly.

programme.title: A Fine Mess
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E04, Steve buys an engagement ring and practices proposals, often with Noah assuming the role of Janet. Dylan grows tired of living with Gina and suggests that she find her own place. David's radio show becomes popular due to his abrasive tactics.

programme.title: The Loo-Ouch
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E05, Steve and Janet announce the pregnancy and engagement to her parents, who respond by calling Janet a disgrace. Matt and Noah each offer to move out so that Steve can move Janet and the baby into the house.

programme.title: 80's Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E06, David's radio persona gets flack-and ratings; Matt tries to overturn a death sentence for a rapist-murderer; the after-hours club attracts the wrong attention; Steve haunts the house.

programme.title: Baby, You Can Drive My Car
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E08, Janet begins to panic about wedding preparations. Steve suggests that they organize a scavenger hunt for their friends, with clues providing the location of a party. Gina freaks out when Dylan refuses to pull over and help a stray dog.

programme.title: Family Tree
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E09, Steve and Janet endure various calamaties on their honeymoon. Just as they are beginning to have a good time, Janet goes into labor. Jackie seeks full custody of Erin, and David and Kelly try to keep their sister's spirits up.

programme.title: Nine Yolks Whipped Lightly
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E12, Gina's meeting with her father is unsatisfying, similar to Janet and her parents; Donna can't let go of Noah's accident; Dylan loses control in front of kids, and has second thoughts about Kelly, but is too late.

programme.title: I'm Using You 'Cause I Like You
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E14, Donna and David meet promising new mates; Kelly decides to quit the store; Matt violates his suspension; Dylan suffers from fast-lane acquaintances; the Sanders' hire a nanny.

programme.title: The Final Proof
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E16, Dylan accedes to Shane's demands for Noah; Kelly and Matt prepare to go on a couples game show; Dr. Martin tries to bond with Gina.

programme.title: Eddie Waitkus
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E18, A news report shows a live dead-ringer for Dylan's late father; Noah intrudes on Donna's meeting someone new; Kelly compromises her personal feelings for her profession; David gets the wrong idea when he overhears Camille talking with friends.

programme.title: Ever Heard the One About the Exploding Father?
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E20, Dylan's father makes him an offer; Steve lobbies for Ryan's return to college; David interviews for a job in New York; Matt represents a stand-up comic fired for not being funny.

programme.title: The Easter Bunny
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E22, Kelly grows suspicious of Matt's distant behavior. Camille tries to convince Donna to sell her clothing online. Steve and Janet fear that her parents' dog is to blame for the death of their snooty neighbors' pet rabbit.

programme.title: And Don't Forget to Give Me Back My Black T-Shirt
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E23, Mitch annoys Donna by trying to plan their entire relationship via an electronic organizer. Janet nixes Steve's plans to invest in Donna's site because of their limited finances.
